placeName: Montana Vortex and House of Mystery
placeDesc: This whimsical place is fun, weird and interesting even for the most sceptical. Step into the garden and the slanted House of Mystery—see and experiment for yourself! The one-hour tour is given by one of the owners but you’ll also have time to explore the mysteries and anomalies on your own.
placeShortDesc: A classic mystery spot complete with spots that are said to make you shrink or grow when you stand on them.
placeNearby: Lake McDonald,Wreck of the Steamship Helena,Going-to-the-Sun Road
placeRelatedPlaces: Bayers Lake Mystery Walls,Moncton Magnetic Hill,Gravity Hill,Rua do Amendoim (Peanut Street)
